Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements about deploying applications are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: A setup program installs the necessary files in the Program Files directory by default.
The Merge Module Project allows creating a single package for shared components.
The Deployment Property Page option allows you to specify configuration-dependent properties.
The first step in deploying the software includes setting deployment properties.
The File System Editor allows selecting items to be added to the deployment project.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(True), (B)-(True), (C)-(False), (D)-(False), and (E)-(True).
